divs: sighting detailsstopped at a stop sign shortly after picking up my date for new years eve. checked for traffic and noticed out of my upper periferal vision that there was 8 lights blinking and stationary at the same time. my date and i looked at the object\objects and could not tell if the object was a solid object or 8 individual objects. the lights then just dissappeared before our eyes. the lights may have been 1 - 1.5 miles out. however, if i held up my arm the object would have stretched out longer then the width of my thumb. i will attempt to attach the very location via google maps street view and the artist rendering of the lights. which by the way were square lights. the lights were not orb shaped.
Summary: stopped at a stop sign,checked for traffic and noticed 8 square lights for 10 sec then disappeared
